derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English fearn, of West Germanic origin; related to Dutch varen and German Farn

entry.def: A fern is a plant that has long stems with feathery leaves and no flowers. There are many types of fern.

means.word_mean: 1. any of numerous flowerless and seedless vascular plants having true roots from a rhizome and fronds that uncurl upward; reproduce by spores
